entry.title: Trump Floats Bitcoin Critic and JP Morgan CEO Jamie Dimon for Treasury Secretary
entry.summary: Prominent Bitcoin hater Jamie Dimon could be an ideal Treasury Secretary, according to Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump.

entry.title: Cats In, Dogs and Frogs Out: Meme Coin Meta May Be Shifting
entry.summary: Every dog has its day—but right now, cat-themed tokens are taking over the meme coin meta and outperforming more serious crypto categories.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 160 - CHATTING TO ROBINHOOD!
entry.summary: BTC ETF Inflows: +$423m. Crypto pushes higher, biggest ETF inflow in 6 weeks. Mt. Gox FUD ‘overestimated’ as whales accumulate. Kraken to begin Mt. Gox repayments in 7-14d. ETH spot ETFs will push ETH to $5k: Bitwise. SOL ETF will be next: Bloomberg. XRP up 35% this week ahead of potential settlement. Aethir reports $36m H1 customer revenue. Craig Wright now under threat of perjury & forgery. FTX & CFTC in $12.7bn settlement. WLD up 40% after delaying unlock schedule. Helio announces instant crypto fiat commerce. Phantom pauses cross-chain swaps amid exploit.

entry.title: Anthropic and Menlo Ventures Launch $100 Million Fund to Fuel AI Innovation
entry.summary: The Anthology Fund launched by Anthropic and Menlo Ventures aims to accelerate AI innovation across multiple sectors.

entry.title: Arthur Hayes’ Maelstrom Fund Aims to Boost Bitcoin Development via Grants
entry.summary: BitMEX co-founder Arthur Hayes aims to boost Bitcoin's technical development via grants from his Maelstrom Fund.

entry.title: Bitcoin Bridge Coming to Telegram-Linked TON Blockchain
entry.summary: The Open Network (TON) is launching a bridge to let users bring their Bitcoin to the Telegram-linked network for DeFi use.

entry.title: XRP Rallies 40% in a Week, Flips Solana's Trading Volume
entry.summary: The rally follows the launch of new financial instruments for the cryptocurrency last week.

entry.title: Grayscale Debuts Its Decentralized AI Fund to Track Projects Like Filecoin, Bittensor
entry.summary: "The blockchain-based AI protocols embody the principles of decentralization, accessibility, and transparency," said an exec in a release.

entry.title: German Bitcoin Sale Netted 'Unprecedented' €2.6 Billion: Dresden Prosecutor
entry.summary: The proceeds will be held in custody until the end of criminal proceedings for the German and Polish nationals from whom they were seized.

entry.title: Here Are Today's ‘Hamster Kombat’ Daily Combo and Cipher Code

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 159 - MEMECOINS GO MAD!
entry.summary: BTC ETF Inflows: +$301m. BTC dips from $65k as $6bn moves from Mt. Gox. Coinbase & MicroStrategy surge with BTC. Genesis sells another $38m BTC. ETH ETF timeline delayed until July 23rd. Trump chooses crypto friendly Vance as VP. Old clip shows Vance bashing Gensler on crypto. Bitcoin is good during debasement: Larry Fink. Michael Dell calls Fink video ‘fascinating’. Fear & Greed index shifts to Greed. Tether mints $1bn USDT on Tron. Stripe expands crypto integration to the EU.

entry.title: Trump Says He’s Making More NFTs — Even Though the Last Ones Never Sold Out
entry.summary: While an assassination attempt on the former president has renewed interest, the performance of Trump's NFTs has historically been mixed.

entry.summary: Gains in broader markets are reflecting a positive sentiment for risk assets, encompassing crypto and meme stock king GameStop.

entry.title: Anthropic Brings Claude AI App to Android
entry.summary: Two months after its debut on iOS, the generative AI tool is now available on Google's mobile platform.

entry.title: Robot Dance Lessons Could Make Them More Agile and Less Scary
entry.summary: Dancing, waving, and giving high-fives are ways robots could be better able to live “in harmony” with humans, researchers say.

entry.title: Technology Journalists Win Protections Against AI
entry.summary: A strike was averted as Ziff Davis journalists from PC Mag, Lifehacker, and Mashable secured pay raises and a say in the use of generative AI.

entry.title: Ripple Backs Campaign to Defeat Crypto Villain Elizabeth Warren
entry.summary: The crypto company gave $1 million to a PAC dedicated to unseating the prominent crypto critic in November.

entry.title: 'What The Punk' Film Traces the History of Ethereum's Iconic NFT CryptoPunks
entry.summary: From free mint to influencing the NFT boom and impacting the art world, CryptoPunks get a spotlight in "What the Punk."

entry.title: FTX Agrees to $12.7 Billion Settlement With CFTC Over Collapse
entry.summary: The Commodity Futures Trading Commission sued FTX in 2022 following the disgraced crypto brand’s downfall.

entry.title: Republicans Likely to Follow Through With Pro-Crypto Agenda, Experts Say
entry.summary: A Trump victory in November would likely bring pro-crypto reforms, policy experts suggest, with Republicans back in charge.

entry.title: Bitcoin Critic Senator Menendez Convicted of Taking Bribes in Gold
entry.summary: Menendez once bashed Bitcoin as an “ideal choice for criminals,” even though he received most of his bribes in cash.

entry.title: 'Deadrop' Gets First Update Since Dr. Disrespect Dismissal—Only for NFT Holders
entry.summary: In the first update since Dr. Disrespect was kicked out of the company, Deadrop looks to refine its R.A.T. vs Claw shooter dynamic.

entry.title: Trump Bets Push Polymarket to Record Volume as Nate Silver Joins
entry.summary: Polymarket saw $111 million in trading last month. With two weeks left in July, activity has already surged past that.

entry.title: Everyday Users Contributed Less Than 1% of Trump’s Crypto Donations
entry.summary: The vast majority of Donald Trump’s $3.3 million worth of on-chain donations came from top industry executives—not ordinary crypto holders.

entry.title: Bitcoin Mining Stock Values Rising Faster Than the BTC They Produce: JPMorgan
entry.summary: Mining stocks have exploded 29% this month, but they now trade fairly high compared to the BTC they’re likely to mine.

entry.title: Satoshi Shame: Craig Wright Ordered to Declare He Isn't Bitcoin Creator
entry.summary: A UK court ordered Wright to publicly say he is not Bitcoin's creator, Satoshi Nakamoto, and is not the author of the Bitcoin white paper.

entry.title: Meme Coins Surge Alongside Other Risk Assets Following Trump Shooting
entry.summary: Meme coins—typically the riskiest cryptocurrencies around—have spiked since the failed Donald Trump assassination attempt on Saturday.

entry.title: DeFi Protocol Li.Fi Hacked for $11 Million in Ethereum, Stablecoins
entry.summary: About $11 million worth of Ethereum and stablecoins were swiped from cross-chain DeFi protocol Li.Fi, the project confirmed to Decrypt.

entry.title: ‘Catizen’ Studio Secures Funding as Telegram Game Hits 25 Million Players
entry.summary: Pluto Studio, the team behind rising Telegram game Catizen, announced funding from The Open Platform (TOP) as the TON token drop looms.

entry.title: Kraken: Mt. Gox Bitcoin Repayments Will Arrive Before August
entry.summary: Over a decade after losing 850,000 Bitcoin, Mt. Gox creditors could be paid as early as next week according to Kraken.

entry.title: Bitcoin Developers Launch BTC-Backed Stablecoin As Rune Token
entry.summary: Hermetica, the developers behind USDh, is taking a page from the Ethena playbook to offer holders a 12% to 25% yield during a bull market.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 158 - A WILD WEEKEND FOR BITCOIN
entry.summary: Trump response optimism takes BTC to $63K. Bitcoin whales accumulate most since April 2023. Trump still set to talk at Bitcoin Nashville. ETH ETF approval this week: Geraci. XRP vs SEC press conference rumoured on 18th. Crypto funds saw $1.44B inflows last week. Rumours China is to ‘unban BTC’ in Q4. S. Korea may delay crypto taxes until 2028. Russia to allow crypto trading on stock exchange. All altcoin categories outperform BTC over 7d. BitConnect infamous promoter convicted. Scroll becomes 8th L2 with TVL over $1bn. ETHFI Season 2 claims available this week. Base hits record 1m UserOps in a week.

entry.title: Zoltan Istvan on AI and Human Immortality
entry.summary: Transhumanist Party founder Zoltan Istvan chats with Decrypt's Emerging Technology report Jason Nelson about his journey with transhumanism, running for office, and why he fears AI is outpacing life science and poses a threat to the quest for immortality.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 157 - ROLLBIT FRIDAY!
entry.summary: The German state sells $2bn+ BTC and has under $300m left. BTC ETF sees $800M of inflows, Mr 100 keeps buying. SOL ETF deadline set for 2025, election could be key. SOL stablecoin TVL soars on Tether & PYUSD growth. Firedancer sees the first accepted block on SOL testnet. ETH ETFs finally expected next week. Monthly active crypto addresses top 100m. Trump to speak at Bitcoin Nashville conference. Golman Sachs to launch 3 tokenization projects. Short squeeze in altcoins sees TIA rise 80% from lows. MOG leads top memes coins, BONK flips WIF. Farming interest shifts to Berachain & Monad.

entry.title: What's the Meta? Meet the Solana Dev Who Suffered Third Degree Burns to Pump a Token
entry.summary:
Meet Mikol: the Dare dev that doused himself in isopropyl alcohol and had fireworks shot at him. He instantly went up in flames and was rushed to hospital, where it became apparent he suffered third degree burns.
In this episode, Mikol reflects on the biggest night of his life, details his injuries, and the grueling recovery process he’s still in. Despite the traumatic incident, Mikol isn’t done with the project. Instead, he’s planning to build a decentralized app where community members can take on dares in exchange for DARE tokens.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 156 - ETH ON THE RISE!
entry.summary: BTC ETF Flows: +$147m. ETH outperforms with ETF optimism. Germany government moves 2375 BTC again. Tether mints another $250m USDT on SOL. Trump to speak at Bitcoin Nashville. Goldman Sachs to launch 3 tokenisation projects. Realised losses similar to COVID period. Staked ETH nears ATH. CEX stablecoin volume hits 7-month low. CFTC says 70-80% of crypto not securities. Base hardfork improves compression 20-30%. BitMEX pleads guilty to AML violation. APTOS & SEI see weak attendance at ETHcc event.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 155 - ETFs SAVE THE DAY
entry.summary: BTC ETF Flows: $216m. $654m of inflows into ETFs over 3 days. BTC transaction fees hit 4-year low. German state moves $300m BTC, holdings $1bn. SOL flips ETH for 7d DEX volumes. SOL Firedancer sees first accepted block on testnet. Tether mints another $250m USDT on SOL. Crypto monthly active addresses tops 100m. Biden crypto veto now expected to be upheld. Tech coalition urges Biden to back crypto. People face security threats at ETHCC. DBS sees 300% growth in crypto trading. PYUSD now 7th largest stable coin. China may have already sold BTC holdings. Elliptic exposes $11bn USDT scam network. StanChart in talks to buy Howard’s crypto fund. Polychain accuses former employee of side deals. SEI leads altcoins as it launches v2 mainnet beta. TIA rises 80% from lows on short squeeze. TON to release L2 based on Polygon’s tech stack.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 154 - THE CELEBS ARE BACK...
entry.summary: BTC ETF Flows: +$295m. ETF inflows fight German selling, BTC unchanged. German government sells $900m BTC, moves more. Rate of sales implies German supply sold this week. ETH ETFs set to launch next week. Election may affect SOL ETF decision March 2025. Raydium beats ETH for 24hr fees. BTC ‘power law’ points to 300% gain by 2025. BTC in 80 day post-halving re-accumulation phase. BlackRock treasury fund hits $500m. Republicans release pro-crypto policy. Senate urges blockchain tests for national security. Drop in BTC mining difficulty ‘comparable to FTX’. MetaMask introduces delegation toolkit. 25 major projects to launch tokens in H2 2025.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 153 - A WEAK WEEKEND
entry.summary: BTC sinks 5% then bounces back to unchanged. $58-60k the main area for ‘shorts to defend’. Crypto funds saw $441m inflows last week. German government transfers 1000 BTC to sell. Crypto sentiment at lowest in over a year. ETH spot premium hits local highs. Japanese firm Metaplanet buys $2.5m BTC. Expect more miners merging: TeraWulf CEO. SOL Firedancer bug bounty goes live. GLM transfers $117m of ETH treasury to exchanges. 98% of coins have topped this cycle: Kang. ETH ETF should come in next 2 weeks: Geraci. Crypto progress disheartening: Copeland.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 152 - JOINED BY DEEZE!
entry.summary: BTC hits $54k, set for worst week in over year. Mt. Gox begins to move BTC & make distributions. German government continues to sell holdings. Worst day for BTC liquidations since FTX. Justin Sun says he is willing to buy German BTC. German MP calls on it to stop selling BTC. $52k super-trend support line eyed for BTC. Funding rates turn extremely negative across majors. Only 6 mining machines profitable below $56k. Coinbase spot buyers emerge to counter drop. Total3 hits RSI lows only hit 4 times in last 4 years. Fear & Greed index hits lowest since Jan 2023. Capo remains bullish. Real selling begins at $38k: Schiff. Coinbase continue to fight for Gensler’s emails. Circle mints $250m USDC on SOL. Symbiotic hits $1bn TVL. Taiwan Mobile may open crypto exchange. Unisat completes funding round with Binance.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 151 - BTC TAPS THE 60K LINE
entry.summary: BTC ETF Flows: -$14m. BTC drops to $60k, CME gap filed again. $1bn shorts liquidated if we rally to $62.6k. Pump(.)fun surpasses ETH for revenue. ETH will outperform BTC after ETF launch: K33. ETH ETF may be delayed even further. BTC heading to $150k: Fundstrat. Chainlink & Fidelity partner for fund data on-chain. USDC protects the dollar: Circle ad. Robinhood considers crypto futures in US & EU. Another BTC miner looks to IPO in US. Vitalik bullish on prediction markets. Sentient Labs raises $85m for AI on SOL. Mantra to tokenise $500m of real estate. TAO falls 15% after security breach. Crypto scams & hacks hit $572m in Q2.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 150 - BILLY TO A BILLY?
entry.summary: BTC ETF inflows hit highest in a month. ETH ETF inflows to hit $5bn in 6 months: Gemini. ETH public funds see largest outflow since 2022. SOL hits new ATH for monthly economic value. Sellers starting to look exhausted: Crypto Quant. Silvergate sued by SEC, settles for $63m. Circle gets stablecoin license for USDC in EU. US DoJ ironically chooses Coinbase for custody. Bitcoin miner aims for $16bn IPO. Bitfarms increases BTC mining amid takeover attempt. DOT has 2 year runway amid large burn. DOT ecosystem builders turn against team. PENDLE TVL falls $3bn as restaking rewards end. PayPal stablecoin goes live on Jupiter. At least $600m altcoin unlocks this month.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 149 - LUCA NETZ LIVE!
entry.summary: BTC bounces back above $61k after nosedive. SOL leads majors, BTC dominance falls. BTC RSI hit 18, largest net selling day in over a year. $174m ETF outflow led by GBTC. German government sells $24m more more BTC. Mt Gox info probably ‘leaked to insiders’. Mr 100 buys dip for first time in 34 days. SOL leads Moonpay transactions for 5th week. Trump may speak at Bitcoin Nashville. Biden rehires crypto advisor. Crypto & AI complement each other: Balaji. Bitcoin will protect AI’s wealth: Pomp. Tether stops minting on Algorand & EOS. Jupiter launches v3 swaps. ETH Foundation mailing list gets leaked. Jump CEO resigns after CFTC investigation. 54% of Japanese institutional investors want BTC. Strike launches in UK. MiCA approved EUR stablecoins coming in 6 days.

entry.title: Transhumanism and the Quest for Immortality with SingularityNET CEO Dr. Ben Goertzel
entry.summary: Transhumanism is a philosophical and intellectual movement that advocates the enhancement of the human condition using technologies that can increase longevity, cognition, and well-being. In this interview, SingularityNET founder and CEO Dr. Ben Goertzel discusses his background in the transhumanist movement and how AI, and AGI will play a part.

entry.title: Vivendi Web3 Lead: 'There's No Ethical GenAI if You Don't Protect Content'
entry.summary: Fabien Aufrechter, VP of Web 3.0 at Vivendi, joined Rug Radio's Farokh aboard the Joker Odyssey at Cannes Lions to discuss the media group's plans for a global digital copyright, and how token-gated media will lead to the end of third-party cookies.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 148 - SOL ETF NARRATIVE DOMINATES
entry.summary: SOL leads majors as Van Eck files for ETF. Bitwise hints at SOL ETF filing. SOL will get ETF, ADA & XRP won’t: GSR. SOL price may rise 8.9x with ETF: GSR. Coinbase & Stripe team up for onboarding. BTC miner sell pressure weakens. BTC activity drops to lowest level in 10 years. Steve Cohen shuts down crypto arm of hedge fund. Crypto unmentioned in Presidential debate. Kraken co-founder donates $1m to Trump. Bolivia lifts BTC ban. MegaLabs raises $20m, aims for 100k TPS.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 147 - THE BLAST FALLOUT
entry.summary: Crypto bounces, ETFs see another small net inflow. The US government sends 3940 BTC to exchanges. Spot ETH ETFs may be coming July 4th. Coinbase sues SEC over FOIA inquiries. Most ‘obvious & attractive’ buying opp possible. US man convicted of home invasions to steal BTC. Blast launches at $2.5bn FDV, disappoints many. ADA faces DDoS attacks with 200 transactions. Losses from deep fakes could hit $24bn in 2024. Miners face M&A boom on AI retrofitting. Marathon mines $16M KAS. Vitalik introduces ZK voting company Rarimo. Animoca Brands considers public listing.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 146 - IT'S BLAST DAY!
entry.summary: BTC ETFs reverse 7-day outflow. Geverman government to sell $35m more BTC. SOL Blinks allows transactions from any website. Jupiter allows you to swap tokens from X. Helius allows SOL staking from X. Drift allows you to leverage trade from X. ETH supply increases for 73 days straight. ETF review going smoothly: Gensler. Expect $15bn net inflows for ETH ETF: Bitwise. VanEck to waive ETH ETF fee until 2025. UAE new regulations could limit stablecoins. Court convicts two men for crypto ‘securities fraud’. BTC ETFs to be approved by Morgan Stanley. Vanguard CEO calls BTC ‘a stable asset like gold’. Blast launches today, 16.5% as community airdrop. $2.9bn FDV for Blast on Aevo, others predict higher. Top Blast holders to see vesting over 6 months. Nubank to integrate Bitcoin Lightning Network. FTX creditors to vote on cash or crypto repayment.

entry.summary: BTC bounces back above $61k after nosedive. SOL leads majors, BTC dominance falls. BTC RSI hit 18, largest net selling day in over a year. $174m ETF outflow led by GBTC. German government sells $24m more more BTC. Mt Gox info probably ‘leaked to insiders’. Mr 100 buys dip for first time in 34 days. SOL leads Moonpay transactions for 5th week. Trump may speak at Bitcoin Nashville. Biden rehires crypto advisor. Crypto & AI complement each other: Balaji. Bitcoin will protect AI’s wealth: Pomp. Tether stops minting on Algorand & EOS.
